website_summaries.verdict: An entry-level model, this highly affordable CB radio provides the best quality for the lowest price.
cons: Some owners complain that the radio is too quiet

customer_reviews.title: Great device even better for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised when I install this in my wife jeep. Very easy to place almost anywhere in your vehicle. We placed it on the glove box. And it was still out of the way. Very powerful. You can pick up even farther out with the RF knob that comes with it. We have a hustler white antenna with it. Tuned it with an srw or SWR meter. This thing works so well it's better than my bigger CB in my big truck. I'm thinking of picking up another one of these to put in my pickup truck. Again very impressed. Plan on buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: lifeiswonderful

customer_reviews.title: Likker little unit works as avertised and does it well
customer_reviews.text: My second CB radio. I must say for what I use it for it is perfect. It is loud and Clear with a tuned Antenna like my MOST highly recommended Firestick. Very easy to use, Is very small and compact, Easy install and Setup. You can be up and running quickly with this device. It was purchased as my backup CB for my Jeep but instantly became my primary while off road. You want small, loud, clear and economical????? BUY THIS
customer_reviews.author: Tim Euler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome radio for cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I added a PA speaker and noticed 2 things. 1. When the switch is on PA it will send all CB transmissions out to the PA speaker, my solution is to turn the squelch all the way up to prevent unwanted sound coming out of the PA. 2. The CB to PA switch itself acts up. Sometimes I have to wiggle it in order to use the PA speaker. Not a big deal considering the overall price of the unit. I can still yell at people in traffic.
customer_reviews.author: AK_Kev_007

customer_reviews.title: Basic, simple, and bulletproof.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a CB radio in my work truck for yard communication, so I went with this. I've been a truck driver for 24 years, so of course I have a big radio that has been modded, but those require fiddling to get them to work correctly. Now that I'm doing local work, I just don't have time to mess around with it. This radio, with an 18 foot coax cable, and a basic Francis fiberglass whip antenna is simple, cheap, and works every time. No hassle at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff and Laurie Bristow

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a week of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a week long road trip. Once I installed it in my truck (Late model Tacoma), I tuned it and tested it to make sure it worked. Then I did not use it until the trip a few weeks later. I used it everyday for a week and it worked great. Then once we started the trip home, the speaker on it went out. This model was said to be very durable so I am very surprised and disappointed that it does not work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Robby Browder

customer_reviews.title: Dose not work
customer_reviews.text: This CB simply did not work. Kept blowing fuses. However it was replaced and the other works great but I am stuck with this one. I can not return it at a Amazon Hub because my printer broke and my time ran out to return it at the hub. I can not get hold of anyone, so it seems that I am getting stuck with this CB that dose not work.
customer_reviews.author: james adams

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level CB
customer_reviews.text: You will read that there is an issue with the speaker not being loud enough. The fact is that this CB is really small. The mic in the picture that comes with it is really small too which makes the CB seam bigger. With a speaker that will fit in the housing, it has to be small. If the bottom, where the speaker is located is not blocked, it helps. Unless you want a expensive galaxy or something, this CB is okay. The small size is nice and it's not complicated. If I'm talking to someone in the range of about 2.5 miles, the sound is pretty clear.
customer_reviews.author: beetle_X

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dang good and cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I love how small this CB is. I have it Installed where my old one used to be in front of the middle seat in my truck. Now people dont have to worry about hitting their knees on the radio. I almost don't notice it. A few ofthe cool things about this CB are with the PA system. In PA mode you can control how loud the sound comes out. Also if you have it tuned to a station on the CB, it'll play everything through the loud speaker. In order to make the stations come through, I turned the squelch all the way up.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Luff

customer_reviews.title: Won’t transmit or receive further than 200’
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work unless I can see the whites of the drivers eyes in the vehicle I’m trying to talk with.
customer_reviews.author: Kdub

customer_reviews.title: Noise is so bad it’s unusable
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have used this before the return date passed. This radio, PRO505XL, is unusable. The only thing it picks up well is electrical interference. I was asked to rate noise cancellation, what a joke. There is none. The noise is so bad the radio won’t pick up anything unless it’s very close. I tried it at home and in my vehicle with a magnetic whip. I’m going to try to find a used vintage unit and throw this waste of money in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: UNHappy User

customer_reviews.title: Wow! What a diamond in the rough!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my semi just as a stop gap in between expensive brands and have been blown away with the quality of this little guy. Other than the compactness of it there is not one problem I have with it. I'm not a CB guru but I hooked it up to my company truck with stock antennas and such and I'm able to recieve transmissions from almost 1,000 miles away! No more big expensive toys for me, I'm sold with this little guy!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Netting

customer_reviews.title: Great product for Jeep Wrangler!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought for my Jeep Wrangler and it fits in the compartment under the arm rest. I have it plugged into the power outlet in there and works perfectly. I like that it’s really small and hidden and I can lock it in there so no one can steal it with the top down. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: George DiIorio

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a few months ago just hooked it up & tested with swr meter all looked good. I turn it on & got nothing but static 😔 pretty frustrated considering Amazon isn't giving me a option to return to get a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Colton

customer_reviews.title: Lots of features for small price.
customer_reviews.text: I’m totally satisfied with this unit except that the speaker faces downward. An external speaker is recommended to hear best. I installed this in my 1966 Pontiac. Wiring it into the fuse block and finding a ground was very easy. It is mounted under the center dash, but I can reach it easily since my arms are long. I initially had it closer to the driver floor well, but kept hitting it when getting behind the wheel. I also wired in an optional PA speaker under the hood.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Sound is bad and no scan feature
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is rather terrible. At least I can hook up an external speaker. Also, I'm not sure why these don't have a scan mode. Seems like it's 2019 and our phones can do more crap now then most home computers could 5 years ago. Hopefully they can add a scanning feature to an affordable CB radio. As far as the wattage on my SW meter these things are pretty tuned and the wattage is just about 4watts. They do receive and transmit fairly well but man that speaker is garbage. It might as well not come with the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Dg3toyota

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL JUNK
customer_reviews.text: WILL NOT TRANSMITT ANY THING SHORTS OUT WHEN U TRY!!!!!!!!!!!! UNIDEN IS TOTAL CRAP P.O.S. NOT WORTH ANY THING WHY DO U SELL THIS GARBADGE!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good little CB
customer_reviews.text: It's a CB radio and works like it should. Easy to mount to center of dash on Jeep Wrangler. We use it for group rides.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great radio value, NEEDS SWR METER to setup.
customer_reviews.text: Great radio, but doesn't have integrated SWR meter. Using this with extension speaker, but works well with it. Solid build and controls, transmits and receives well. Make sure you have an SWR meter to setup radio properly!
customer_reviews.author: Concrete Cal

customer_reviews.title: UNIDEN SAYS IT ALL / Very good unit 505xl
customer_reviews.text: I have had a couple of these radios and for the fair price they Really are good solid built radios , I get about 8 miles on mine with a low profile mag mount , and thats line of site on interstate . Good Clean crisp Audio with stock hand mic . Easy to install with cig plug . If you are looking for a good CB Radio without the bells and whistles U found it the UNIDEN 505XL all ways comes through . Nice product I hope they keep these in production . 100 percent Satisfied :)
customer_reviews.author: TECH-MAN

customer_reviews.title: Incredible radio
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Uniden PRO505XL, which is a crazy reliable radio as it is. The build quality of this is phenomenal, and the controls feel solid. It’s a real compact radio, so it can find a spot to sit in just about anywhere. The only dislike I have is the microphone. I like the looks of it, but keying the mic has sort of gummy feel. It does sound fine, it’s just a feel thing to me.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive communication
customer_reviews.text: Brought us across country twice with one in the Penske truck and the other in our car . Probably will not use again as no more moves in our future . A little learning curve on the modulation but the was quickly learned by a fellow CBer who broke in and explained how to adjust. Used with magnetic antennas . I duck taped the one on the mirror of the Penske truck and got by ok. Worked better then on top of the cab .
customer_reviews.author: D. Trump

customer_reviews.title: Excellent radio, until it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to replace my Pro 505. I have a 25 watt VHF/UHF antenna mounted on the other side of my CB antenna on my Jeep spare tire. The 505 would get feedback when I keyed my VHF. The 520, without changing anything, doesn’t have that problem. Very pleased and worth the extra $15. Update: internal speaker stopped working a few months after install. Tried all kinds of things to fix, and it happened long after the return period. Very annoyed, looked online and saw a lot of other people have had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Quixotic

customer_reviews.title: great little cb radio
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I could stay in touch with others on the trail when I was off roading. I thought that was going to have to get a supplemental speaker to be able to hear it and I was pleasantly surprised by how easy it was to use and how loud it was, granted I had it turned all of the way up.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent CB with plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: This cb sounds and receives great, I escort oversize loads all over the USA, so far I havnt had any problems, we talk at ranges up to a mile, everyone says Im loud and clear. I have a single 2 foot firestick antenna mounted on roof of F150
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Halfway decent cb radio
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why I decided on this cb radio originally, but, this was my 1st purchase on my amazon account, and it faired pretty good, until the power cable near the unit went. I suppose that's what you end up with when you end up putting it in the situation I did originally. Despite that, this cb hasn't been that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Russman

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!!!
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Arrived with a blown fuse. Replaced it and plugged it in... immediately started on fire and filled my truck with smoke.. POS!
customer_reviews.author: rob wallace

customer_reviews.title: radio range
customer_reviews.text: great audio. range 3 miles even with a WILSON 1000 WATT antenna EDIT. RECEIVED A DEFECTIVE IN-LINE FUSE HOLDER. HAD TO FIX THE ISSUE WITH A NEW IN-LINE FUSE HOLDER, AT MY EXPENSE. GREAT LITTLE RADIO.BUTTONS ARE VERY SMALL. DRIVING AT NIGHT, I CAN'T SEE ANY OF THE BUTTON. STILL A GREAT RADIO.
customer_reviews.author: bulldog2927

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: It died 9/30/19 so buyer beware it will stop turning on and it will be after the return window closes so your out your money, with not even the possibility to get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: gman

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap radio
customer_reviews.text: Decent little radio. I bought 2. So far I just use it in my Jeep and motorhome to communicate with each other. I get about 1.5 mile range. (My motorhome has A weak signal though) But haven’t really tried it out in a desert setting yet. So far just used it in city traffic. Perfect starter radio. Mic is heavier than it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Glamisfreak

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Radio
customer_reviews.text: This is my first CB radio ever, going into it I had no expectations, I just wanted something to talk to my friends on. After installing and mounting up with a Firestik 2, it works great. After a few tunes near the highway it sounds awesome. For anyone starting CB radio, pick this up along side a good antenna, you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Gage Keeble

customer_reviews.title: but was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very basic CB that gets the job done. No bells and whistles, but was easy to install. I purchased a cigarette lighter adapter for easy removal, and despite the packaging saying you need a direct connection, it works OK in my 98' Grand Cherokee just plugged into the cigarette lighter.
customer_reviews.author: No Signature

customer_reviews.title: Over a year later and still working perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I typically only review and item after owning it for quite a while and I have now had this unit installed for over a year and it works absolutely perfect. Nothing like being on the trail and being able to communicate with everyone in your group crystal clear. Must have for any four-wheel drive guy, but don't forget to get a antenna tuner if you're installing it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Small and easy to operate while driving
customer_reviews.text: Great simple little radio with seperate squelch and RF gain control knobs. I'll probably add one of my external speakers since I'm nearly deaf. And remember, your antenna is the most important part of the system. Location and low SWR makes or breaks RX and TX capabilities!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Hutson

customer_reviews.title: Best Cb for Jeepin and the option for a PA system
customer_reviews.text: Cant say enough, I recommned this Cb to everyone in our club or anyone I meet, its a powerful little guy that does the job well, the PA option allows to reach many people due to being very loud and to tell idiots on the road what there doing wrong
customer_reviews.author: shawn cicero

customer_reviews.title: uniden not honoring updates
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these radios for the update feature. never could update with my spectrum internet cable. I had to use my smart phone as a hotspot to connect to uniden server, now smart phone won't connect to uniden server. notified uniden of problem and never heard back from them. if you expect to update the radio don't count on it. uniden won't help you solve connection problem to their update server.
customer_reviews.author: bob white

customer_reviews.title: Great budget compact cb fit in the needed space and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great budget compact cb fit in the needed space and works great makes our trips down 95 a lot easier the truckers tell ya whats going on everytime traffic slows and even what lane to be in to get around any obstruction
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Not working to good for me
customer_reviews.text: I would buy a better one I don't know much about CB radios but I've tried two different kinds of antennas but hear nothing . had a few radios in past that worked fine . maybe if you got meter and know exactly what to do you could make something happen
customer_reviews.author: Joey motzarillo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: You can not beat the price on this CB for quality. I wanted a Cobra but double the price for same options. This radio works very well. I'm very pleased with it. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ratherbshooting

customer_reviews.title: The little radio that could!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one sturdy little radio!! I have this on a hard mount in the dash of my trail Jeep. It has been beaten, whipped, stabbed, waterboarded, and neglected like a red headed step child. It just keeps on trucking and doesn’t ever need anything. This radio is as tough as a $2 steak! It’s not a monster long distance talker with my 4’ firestick but sounds really great and just works flawlessly every time I switch it on!! I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: J-VanTheMan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second PRO505XL and its an excellent little guy if you don't have alot of room to mount a bigger unit. My first one went with my old suv I had it in when it was sold. I dont need long distance so I'm not sure how it works for this, I use it to communicate with friends on trails when we are offroading and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: amazing price
customer_reviews.text: the reviews all over the net say this is in the top 5 to buy ..i love it,took me about 30 minutes to instal and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact unit but maybe there are not many people ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact unit but maybe there are not many people using cbs anymore. Hardly hear anyone and have not had a conversation yet. Either the airwaves are empty or this unit lacks some power
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install if you don't know how to install a two prong electrical device.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like how it was difficult to install, I couldn't understand how to install it. I tried several two prong adapters and it didn't work, I couldn't figure out how to get the end electrical wires to connect to the two prong adapter anyway, I tried going to NAPA and they helped me buy fuses, electrical tape, electrical installation equipment and to no avail. I will end up giving this away to someone with more experience.
customer_reviews.author: William Bayless

customer_reviews.title: Good enough.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit for emergencies and what not to keep in my truck. It works fine and although it doesn't have good noise cancellation it still works fine and is pretty simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny H.

customer_reviews.title: Great little radio
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little radio after having it peaked and tuned swings about 30 w. Hooked it up is my temporary base and I'm heading 20 miles away. I also caught skip on it from Pennsylvania and I'm in Rhode Island. Well worth the money I spent.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: ... had several Unidens over the years and they're a pretty safe bet
customer_reviews.text: I've had several Unidens over the years and they're a pretty safe bet. I installed this one in my little chevy sonic and it fit in there great. My only real gripe would be that the hand mike is a little chinsy. At times, other folks say they hear a squeeling on my end, and if I cram down on the mike button, it goes away. I haven't had the chance to swap out the mike yet, but its on my list.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have an expensive CB for long-distance and this inexpensive ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an expensive CB for long-distance and this inexpensive unit out preformed it in every way I'm thinking of buying another one to replace my other my expensive one
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great little radio in an easy to use size
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in a 1995 Toyota 4runner that I use for wheelin' and camping. It fits perfect in the slot once designated for the ashtray, I had to trim a little bit of the plastic to get it to slide in all the way. I paired this with the lil Wil magnetic mount antenna and tuned with an swr meter, both units worked great right out of the box! I have decent range about 5 miles, easy to use and the best little radio I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great little radios
customer_reviews.text: These are great and sturdy little radios. My only downfall was that the mic mount screws backed out on me when I attached them to the side of the radio, and one of the mounting bracket thumb-screws backed out on me as well. Though, the actual functions of the radio work very well as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Proffet

customer_reviews.title: Best compact I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Great compact cb. With the 520s RF Gain switch you can adjust the noise out, or go up for more range, it works great with a basic antenna setup, magnetic or mounted, doesn't distort when in close proximity of another radio and has held up in construction equipment. I've upgraded to a bigger microphone and an external speaker, but have almost as much reach and often broadcast clearer than guys with several hundred dollar setups. Ive bought 2 more to upgrade in other vehicles. If you're looking for reliable, compact, no frills this is the best for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Marxen

customer_reviews.title: Works well, housing will deform in vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: About 2 years on the product, still functions without any frills. However, a year into use the plastic shell has completely deformed and cracked open. It looks terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second one is working great.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. The first unit went bad after two weeks. The channel knob would only change the channel in one direction. It’s replacement is going strong after 6 months and a lot of rough roads and use. I do recommend an external speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Silvertip

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding performance for a compact CB
customer_reviews.text: No need for an external speaker with this one. The ANL and squelch work very well eliminating unwanted noise. In a compact CB this is as good as it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Tellitlikeitis

customer_reviews.title: Not great, but ok
customer_reviews.text: Had this radio 11 months, after 9 it started acting up, now after 11 it is unusable. Good price, worked great when it did work.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to write home about.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come ready to go out of the box like most reviews said. Thinking next time I will get one with more adjuster options or just buy the SWR adjuster and do it on my own -I don't think the guy that did it for me knew what he was doing. I would get feedback constantly on the road (without me touching the thing) and had a tough time adjusting/quieting it down.I like the size though because I don't have many options of where to put it in the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Unit not working. Not happy
customer_reviews.text: So after waiting for antenna to arrive today install and turn on .lights up no sound cant transmit .. there is a problem with this unit...how are you gonna remedy this situation????. Damn sure dont wanna wait another few weeks... suppose to start a new job and this was a requirement... plz send me a new unit asap.
customer_reviews.author: William Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Great CB for Jeeps
customer_reviews.text: This little unit is perfect for a vehicle with limited mounting locations. I have it mounted on the dashboard of my Jeep and it does not limit my view of the road.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kline

customer_reviews.title: Truck radio
customer_reviews.text: Mike G I purchased this radio two years ago on the Black Friday special for use in my semi truck. While not a long distance radio(no cbs are). it works fine talking to other trucks close by and gate guards etc. Radio's always have a short life in semi trucks but this one has stood up well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Great little radio
customer_reviews.text: Been talking on my last PRO520XL for well over 10 years. It's still in my pick-up working today. Bought the new one for my Jeep. Needed a compact, light weight radio and after the great service form the last one, this was a no brainer. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Darcon

customer_reviews.title: FIX THE DESCRIPTION, NO PA ON 510
customer_reviews.text: In the description it clearly says the 510 has a pa function. Once I received the CB I couldn’t figure out how to use the pa function so I did some research, turns out the 510 doesn’t have a pa function even though amazon’s description says it does. Fix this, I’m considering a refund if anything else on this 510 doesn’t meet my standards
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Simple cb radio! Not to many options but defiantly a starter cb at a low cost! Would recommend if wanting to start out!
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Good radio, great price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Super simple to use. Make sure you get a PL-259 antenna. The PL 259 is the only connector that fits
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: great radio
customer_reviews.text: Very sweet entry level radio. Small, really tough, very well built, smooth, clean. Audio output on this thing is clear and MSSIVE. Full volume it almost hurts on the hears, but what else you could expect from a radio designed to operate in quarries? If you want to start in CB, GET THIS. Or the 520XL pro wich I also own, and is this same guy with a couple of additional features.
customer_reviews.author: Stef.

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: This was put it my service truck I already had the 505xl which wasn't that great so I tried this one really not what I expected from uniden
customer_reviews.author: Bobby 2.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Range is 3 miles so it works amazing. Very compact and easy to use. I live around mountains so getting 3 miles on this says a lot, im very happy with item and got 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: ANGEL M. VAZQUEZ VICENTY

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this product for the PA function. It works perfect and loud. The unit is small enough to fit under my car seat. Great quality and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell G.

customer_reviews.title: nice item
customer_reviews.text: quality device. unfortunately there's not a whole lot of people using these anymore. good for PA and emergency contingency.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Radio
customer_reviews.text: Great little budget radio. Does what it's supposed to do. Picked up quite a few stations with this thing, but there isn't much cb traffic in my area. Hooks ups easily with no programming required. Wish it had a channel scan feature, but I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used a CB in years and just decided to use this for a short road trip. Good radio if your antenna is tuned.
customer_reviews.author: J. C

customer_reviews.title: Should have went with Cobra
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have a channel scan feature or Weather Channel pretty much your basic bitch CB low range about 2 to 3 MI
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully and listed at a great price. I always research products like this before I buy them and this one was on the top of the list for occaisonal users like ourselves. We have had it for over a year now and it still sounds as clear as day. Easy to use and works well with other systems. Just make sure your other componets match up (cables/antenna and such).
customer_reviews.author: N.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Not the best out there but I am able to communicate without issues with my my Jeep buddies while on the trails. Didn’t spend crazy amounts on a radio like most of my friends, that I enjoy a lot.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Great CB and very easy to install. Don't forget a good antenna.
customer_reviews.author: DAN H GERKE

customer_reviews.title: Not a great unit for price,spend little more or you will be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for,works intermittently, poor reception,lots of back ground noise,going to replace with a better unit in spring.
customer_reviews.author: monty r wilson

customer_reviews.title: which is perfect for use in my WJ and RAM
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one! They are small, which is perfect for use in my WJ and RAM! Easy to install (don't forget to buy the male plug cig lighter bit), works well. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Toxic Fox Designs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little unit for price.
customer_reviews.text: Best for money compact radio dump your Cobra DX-19's. Great audio and durability. Send it into a small linear and you've got you a talking little rig for 4x4 ops. Microphone is much more durable
customer_reviews.author: Will S.

customer_reviews.title: So far so great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as an alternative to the Cobra models that do not seem to last very long in a commercial truck fleet I service. So far these little things have held up great.
customer_reviews.author: pfhattkatt

customer_reviews.title: A simple cb radio for my new Jeep Wrangler; ...
customer_reviews.text: A simple cb radio for my new Jeep Wrangler; just plug it into my cigarette lighter (with adapter) and lay the cb on my passenger seat or any other area/surface within the Jeep. It does not have to be mounted hard which causes you to drill holes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C Turner

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: PA system even with a decent speaker still sounds like booty. Also, I am sure this unit can't pick up decent signal. I think next time I'll just buy a decent brand like cobra.. And yes I have very good dual antennas, and high quality cable.
customer_reviews.author: Shirlee Trinidad

customer_reviews.title: Its alright
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic radio for use on the trails. I have no problem talking to people im following on a trail or hearing them. But if your wanting to use it on the road, you'll notice you cant tune the radio and will have trouble talking to people further away. I can hear truckers with finally tuned radio several miles away but they can never here me. Although if you're buying this radio, I am sure your buying it to put in an offroad rig... in which case I would say buy it. Haven't had any problems since I put it in!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great CB Radio.
customer_reviews.text: Small, compact and very easy to use. PLus its a quality CB Radio for the money! This is the second one I've bought, and not because the first one went bad... but because I had to install one in our 2018 Jeep Rubicon JKU.
customer_reviews.author: juanjoselopez1

customer_reviews.title: Big 10-4 on this one
customer_reviews.text: Nice little unit with PA capability and an external speaker plugin for a great price! Perfect for a grouchy old Jeep Gladiator, and handy to have on trails. Installation is a piece of cake, assuming you have a good space to place it in.
customer_reviews.author: RTS76

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY FOR MONEY ,CAPABLE TO HANDLE JOB DESIGNED FOR.
customer_reviews.text: Works very-well when coupled with a good mobile antenna,and a good low s.w.r. match.(I use a K-40,w/mag. base.) tuned @ 1.1-to -1.2, across all 40 channels.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L Sanders     the 1 & only    "  Big Bear Foot "

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Product works great on trail rides. Could hear everyone in the group loud and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas, he asked for it. It didn't work at all, even after buying several different antennas.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Perfertish
customer_reviews.text: We love the CB I put it on my jeep it was easy to Install love the size of a compact easy to put under a seat or in my glove box and does not take up a lot of room with the limited room that I do have The only thing that I could request is that the speaker was a little louder and clearer
customer_reviews.author: Kyle p

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work so well
customer_reviews.text: It feels like it's made of cheap materials and didn't work as well as I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: This is a great starter CB
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter CB. Everything in the kit is good quality. It doesn't feel like it's going to break whenever you use it or install it. You're not going to be talking to astronauts on the ISS with this but it's great for talking to others in a local radius.
customer_reviews.author: Sean stowers

customer_reviews.title: this is a good little unit
customer_reviews.text: Arrived timely, appears as advertised, functions as intended, this is a good little unit. I got it to swap out the Realistic that came with an 85 CJ-7 Jeep. I dropped the firestick it came with and ran a new cable to a Wilson flex antenna. Im not a radio guy but I had it peaked and tuned and I am glad I got the unit with the gain control as it does seem to bring that distant signal in just enough to make it out.
customer_reviews.author: RSK

customer_reviews.title: Great cb
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly surprised at how well this worked. Almost had a 4 mile range. We mounted a couple of these in our silage chopper and trucks. They worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Scholten

customer_reviews.title: Was delivered as stated and came quickly.
customer_reviews.text: This CB rates very well and I am very happy with my purchase. Shipping, quality, and price is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: NO PA. Just a simple CB for too much money
customer_reviews.text: No PA function. Just go to Walmart and buy a CB for cheaper and it does more. This was a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: 04TJ_SQUY

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Price was great. Unfortunately I returned because I couldn’t get it to work. Ordered a different model.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Good radio
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. There are no internal mods like other uniden products, only downside
customer_reviews.author: lizmarie a.

customer_reviews.title: Short wires for connection but a very great product.
customer_reviews.text: Comes with mic. Easy to install! However the power cord is very short so you will need some extra red and black wire.
customer_reviews.author: Lane Traver

customer_reviews.title: Best low cost CB there is!
customer_reviews.text: Best little low cost CB on the market. Easy install and simple to use. Impressed with the distance it gets out to and it’s durability. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a low cost CB!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This little radio is perfect for any vehicle! It's definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Y.

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a gift for a friend. He told me it works great and picks up signal very well even when off-roading.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to write home about.
customer_reviews.text: So PA function works, radio seems to be a POS though. I bought a good antenna and wire but this thing won’t pick up barely anything. Also PA also shares any radio feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota G

customer_reviews.title: a must have for overlanding
customer_reviews.text: compact enough for your needs. sounds good for the right price. paired this radio with a K40 and it gets out there. get you one today!
customer_reviews.author: Rob-The Mad Scientist

product_meta.title: Uniden PRO520XL Pro Series 40-Channel CB Radio. Compact Design. ANL Switch and PA/CB Switch. 7 Watts of Audio Output and Instant Emergency Channel 9. - Black
product_meta.description: Style:PRO520XL| Pattern Name:CB RadioUniden Cb 2Way Cb Radio 40Ch Compact 7Wat
feature_bullets: Uniden’s Professional Series PRO520XL Heavy-Duty CB radio offers a full 4 watts transmit power, with RF gain control, and 40-Channel operation in a compact rugged construction CB radio.

The PRO520XL has a front mount 4-pin electret microphone with extra-long coiled cord, S/RF LED meter, instant emergency channel 9, transmit indicator lights, Automatic Noise Limiter switch, Public Address switch, Volume control, Squelch control, and more.
Extremely popular for Industrial, Commercial, and Off-Road use. Easily fits in most any vehicle because of its compact size.
Built-in External Speaker Jack allows connecting to an optional external speaker, and you can use the Public Address function to be heard outside your vehicle with an optional PA speaker.

A superheterodyne circuit with phase locked loop technology assures precise frequency control. Included in the box: CB Radio, Microphone, Mounting Hardware, Mounting Bracket, User's Manual, and Two-Year Warranty.
40-channel mobile CB radio with superheterodyne circuit/phase locked loop for precise control
Built-in automatic noise limiter and auto-squelch to eliminate noise and improve communication
Signal/RF meter and LED indicators to monitor activity; instant channel 9 access for emergency situations
Connect external speakers and use PA/CB switch for use as a Public Address system
Front-positioned microphone with extra-long, coiled cord for convenient use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,144 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
